Get predictive indicator for partial models given a model

model_partials.Rd

Get predictive indicator for partial models given a model

model_partials(model, newdata = NULL)

Examples


library(scorecard)
data("germancredit")

dt    <-  var_filter(germancredit, "creditability")

#> [INFO] filtering variables ... 
bins  <-  woebin(dt, "creditability")

#> [INFO] creating woe binning ... 
dtwoe <-  woebin_ply(dt, bins)

#> [INFO] converting into woe values ... 
model <- glm(creditability ~ ., family = binomial(), data = dtwoe)

model_partials(model)

#> # A tibble: 13 x 5
#>    variable                                                 ks   auc    iv  gini
